name: lastchange.vim--Adams
description:
Modified http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=259 and incorporated the following.

* Fixed for VIM 7.X
* Adjusted formatting of date
* No longer truncate minutes to 00
install_details:
Drop file in ~/.vim/plugins/ and at the following within the top 20 lines of your code. The comment character depends on what you are working in. I used a VIM script comment in the example.

" Last Change: ?

Save the file and re-open it. It should populate with a timestamp.

versions.release_notes: Mixed minutes (was using month on accident)
